headline.main: SOUTH AFRICA SETS IMPORT CURB AHEAD; Orders Contracted for Before Sept. 15 May Enter Despite Recent Restrictions PROTEST IS SENT TO HULL Commerce and Industry Group Requests 30-Day Delay -- Large Losses Feared

lead_paragraph: Shippers and steamship lines were informed yesterday that the restrictions recently imposed by the South African Government on imports had been eased to mitigate hardships and inconvenience foreseen by the industry here.
abstract: curbs eased; Commerce and Industry Assn appeals to Hull for delay

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY ASSN OF N Y INC

snippet: Shippers and steamship lines were informed yesterday that the restrictions recently imposed by the South African Government on imports had been eased to mitigate hardships and inconvenience foreseen by the industry here....
